meanings.sent1: After school, I enjoy a tasty nosh of crackers and cheese.
meanings.sent2: During the movie, we shared a delicious nosh of popcorn.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a hidden nosh of nuts and was quite pleased.
meanings.sent4: The picnic table was a treasure trove of nosh, tempting all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh nosh filled the room, making everyone's stomachs growl.

meanings.definition: To eat food enthusiastically or greedily.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't resist and began to nosh on the tasty cookies.
meanings.sent2: At the party, everyone gathered around to nosh on the delicious buffet.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon managed to nosh on the leftovers from the campsite.
meanings.sent4: The kids were so hungry they could nosh through a whole pizza in minutes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked bread made him nosh eagerly, unable to wait any longer.
